Have you ever wondered how to take advantage of our awesome Javascript SDK? Yes? Then you'll love this post.

Everything in here is available trough the Carbon variable.

This blog post shows a few different types of content that's supported and styled with Bootstrap. Basic typography, images, and code are all supported.
